item.title: Why I Built This Portfolio Site
item.description:
After years of building AI systems for others, I realized I needed a better way to showcase my own work. This portfolio site is the result.

Beyond the Resume

Traditional resumes are great, but they can’t capture the full story of technical projects. How do you explain the complexity of a production LLM system or the impact of a computer vision pipeline in a few bullet points?
